column4: Uncategorized;Poipet: Reports say that around midnight

column7: causing severe damage.------The fire was brought under control and authorities are searching for more bodies this morning.------ TVFB------UPDATE: Photos of scene at first light. Unconfirmed reports suggest a vehicle hit a shop selling gas
column8: causing the explosion and fire. (Photos submitted to CNE)------UPDATE:  A 29-year-old woman identified as Ny Soda
